text_block_list.text:
Everyone thought that Grass Wonder was rejecting 
scouts because of a lack of competitiveness.

But after watching her during training the day before, 
it didn't seem like she was such an unassertive girl.
――I want to know her true self.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh…… good evening. 
To be out here at this hour, is something the matter～?
choice_data_list: I was going to ask you that
I was going to ask you that

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Well…… that's right, when I was looking at the night sky, 
I decided to take it easy～. Fufufu, I probably shouldn't though.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But, I plan on heading back to the dorms soon. 
……did you have any other business with me? Well then, I'll be――
choice_data_list: You really don't plan to be scouted?
You really don't plan to be scouted?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh my…… regarding that, 
I thought I had already rejected that before……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Unfortunately, my feelings haven't changed from then. 
I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmmm～…… I'm sorry, 
all I can say about that is…… it's my own personal problem.

I hadn't heard it directly from her mouth, 
but I think I had an idea of what it was.

On the training course the other day, her eyes. 
The hidden feelings behind those determined blue eyes――
choice_data_list: Are you frustrated that you got second?
Are you frustrated that you got second?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……Oh.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: What makes you think that?
choice_data_list: I could see the fire in your eyes
I could see the fire in your eyes

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: My eyes……?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: From just…… my eyes, you could tell?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
……A Yamato Nadeshiko should always be modest. 
With a soft demeanor, and calm bearing. Never wavering, solemn.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That's what I had decided in my heart, but――

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
『Remain calm in the face of adversity』. I can't help but be 
frustrated at my own weakness, and I can't erase this feeling.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I started running by my own will. The path I've chosen 
lays atop the turf. Until I reach the summit, I will not stop.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
That being the case…… no matter the reason, 
I should not yield victory. ……no matter what happens.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: And yet……!
choice_data_list: You can't forgive yourself for losing?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……Yes.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The moment you start to concede, the path to the top is closed. 
It won't do to accept a scout with these half-hearted emotions.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
……To put it another way, it's my own selfishness. 
A personal conviction.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I apologize, but you'll just have to let it go――
choice_data_list: Then I'll ask again when you win
Then I'll ask again when you win

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……Eh?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
By again…… um, perhaps, 
do you mean you'll come and try to scout me again?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A couple months from now, when I enter another 
Selection Race, you'll wait until then……?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Um…… well.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I don't know what to say…… 
I'm not an easy Uma Musume to deal with, you know?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The things I can't yield, I won't yield. 
Once I decide on something, I won't change my mind.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I was uneasy with the results, that's the only reason I've been 
refusing scouts, just so I could enter another Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
……even knowing that, will you still say that? 
『I will wait』?
choice_data_list: I want to support you in your endeavor
I want to support you in your endeavor

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
……Fufu. Are you okay with that? If I don't 
place first in a Selection Race, it means you 
won't be in charge of anyone, you know?
choice_data_list: You'll definitely win next time, though?
You'll definitely win next time, though?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh my～. 
If you say something like that…… Fufufuu.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
……Trainer-san, you're quite good at 
getting me to go along, aren't you?
And then, several months later――

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
―Surging forward, it's Grass Wonder! 
She passes the leaders with ease and moves in to 1st!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
She's pulling away! She's pulling away! What a strong finish! 
She's pulling away―― Grass Wonder, crosses the gooooooal!!
With her strong will, Grass Wonder was magnificent.
And then――

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You got first, huh, Grass!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, even I was surprised～

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What a lie! I won't fall for it! El won't fall for it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That aside, with this you can debut without regret, 
right? The races should get more interesting! 
Passion! Fervor! I'm getting fired up!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Grass-chan, congratulations……! I'll be looking 
forward to the days we can compete together!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I will too～. 
Fufufuu.

Grass Wonder responded to her rivals with a smile, 
then she came over here by herself.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Thank you for coming, Trainer-san.
choice_data_list: Once again, I wanted to talk to you
Once again, I wanted to talk to you

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Fufu…… Yes. 
I've been waiting for you.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Once again……my name is Grass Wonder. 
I look forward to your kind guidance.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Will you accompany me on this journey to the top?
And so, my days with the unyielding Grass Wonder began!
